text: Nadungamuwa Vijaya Raja (, ), also known as simply Nadungamuwa Raja ( â€“ 7 March 2022), was an Indian elephant. For more than a decade, he was the main casket bearer of the procession of Esala. Nadungamuwa Raja was the largest tame elephant in Asia. When Raja died, Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa said that Raja a national treasure. Nadungamuwa Raja died in the early morning of 7 March 2022 at the age of 68/69 from a heart attack. The President of Sri Lanka Gotabaya Rajapaksa ordered that Raja's body be preserved as a stuffed body. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Sri Lanka Category:Individual elephants
title: Nadungamuwa Raja
